definition.p: When excution of a test step fails, these patterns show how the bug is to be reported.

partsAndFunctions.p: Here are the parts of a bug pattern:

tr.td: A number that is unique to this bug pattern.
Format of the title of the bug to be reported with slots for adding specific details to make it unique.
Usually the action of the test case step.
Usually the expected result of the test case step.
How the behavior deviated from the expected result.
